price: (73) And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
